title: Yakusan_Strait to the point of enlightenment -4-engl sub.mp4
description:
Osho_Yakusan: Strait to the point of enlightenment ch 4 : The sutra is long , the night is short
Talk about Zen and diference between traditional and contemporary. Osho is always talking from his experience and therefore it is freedom to listen to him..it is alive.. this is with english subtitles. Video is blocked in whole world (info from Youtube)This is on request of OIF (Osho Internationa fundation) which makes hinders for free osho distributing files.They forged Osho's will and now is process in Court, but they still make problems on basis of copyright.Please share osho files whenever you can..thanks!
